message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. This product holds significant value to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $950,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I see the value in your product, $950,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000, which is still a great deal for both of us considering the product's worth to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. I am pleased to counteroffer at $875,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while allowing for a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
